testimonials.author: Rahim Uddin
testimonials.comment: EZ Bachelor made our mess life way easier. Meal counting, bazar tracking, and monthly calculation are now automatic. No more arguments at month end.

testimonials.author: Sajid Khan
testimonials.comment: As a mess manager, this app saved me hours every week. Everyone can see expenses clearly, so transparency problems are completely gone.

testimonials.author: Mahmud Hasan
testimonials.comment: Before EZ Bachelor, tracking meals was a headache. Now everything is organized in one place. Simple UI and very practical for daily use.

faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.subtitle: Different layouts and styles for team sections.

qna.ques: What is EZ Bachelor and what is it used for?
qna.ans: EZ Bachelor is a digital mess and meal management platform that helps bachelors and shared living groups track meals, expenses, deposits, and monthly calculations easily in one place.
EZ Bachelor is ideal for bachelor messes, hostels, shared flats, and anyone managing group meals and expenses with multiple members.

qna.ques: How do I start using EZ Bachelor?
qna.ans: You can get started by creating an account, setting up your mess, and adding members. Once done, you can begin recording daily meals, costs, and deposits from the dashboard.

qna.ques: Does EZ Bachelor calculate meal rates automatically?
qna.ans: Yes, EZ Bachelor automatically calculates meal rates, individual costs, and balances based on total expenses and meals consumed.

qna.ques: Can I view previous month reports in EZ Bachelor?
qna.ans: Yes, EZ Bachelor keeps monthly records so you can review previous months’ meals, expenses, deposits, and summaries anytime.

qna.ques: Is my data safe in EZ Bachelor?
qna.ans: Yes, EZ Bachelor stores data securely in the cloud, allowing you to access your mess information safely from any supported device.
